plot: Two kidnappers get more than they bargained for from a buxom daughter, her sister and one of their roommates. But the roommate and the other daughter respectively seduce her uncle and state lawyer, who then seduces the aunt.
title: Flesh and Ecstasy
plot_es: Two kidnappers get more than they bargained for from a buxom daughter, her sister and one of their roommates. But the roommate and the other daughter respectively seduce her uncle and state lawyer, who then seduces the aunt.
plot_en: Two kidnappers get more than they bargained for from a buxom daughter, her sister and one of their roommates. But the roommate and the other daughter respectively seduce her uncle and state lawyer, who then seduces the aunt.
